channel.title: Npc tiny problem

item.title: Npc tiny problem
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

I have this same stupid problem, but have yet to find a 100% functioning tutorial or anything on the issue so I made my own semi-cure, I created an integer in client.java for moving along the dialog.

I can help you out if you wanna try it I can help you add it in.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc tiny problem
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

i have a made a small event, this is what ive coded:

if(NPCID == 1552 && xmas == 0){
NpcDialogue = 100;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
xmas += 1;
addItem(962, 1);
}
if(NPCID == 1552 && xmas == 1){
NpcDialogue = 1002;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

then ive coded:

                                  case 1000:
			talk("Ho Ho Ho! Welcome to the Grand Opening of DeathScape!", 1552);
			break;
		case 1001:
			talk("Here! Have a Christmas Cracker!", 1552);
			break;
		case 1002:
			talk("You cant have another one!", 1552;
			break;
		}

and when i talk to him, it adds the xmas cracker and goes straight to “You cant have another one!”

why is it skipping the first bits?

Read full topic
